_meanings:
{@--2@} Hinting at, suggesting or 
implying (as a meaning).

{@--3@} (In <ab>Rhet.</ab>)
The same as {#vyaMjanA#} <ab>q. v.</ab>, or that
power of a word or sentence by 
virtue of which it conveys a sense 
different from its primary or secondary
meaning, suggestive power; <ab>cf.</ab>  
{#aMjana#} also.
